newsitem.title: USA: Dresser unit to sell $110 mln of assets.
newsitem.headline: Dresser unit to sell $110 mln of assets.

text.p: Sub Sea International Inc, a unit of Dresser Industries Inc, said Wednesday it had signed a letter of intent to sell some of its assets to Global Industries Inc for $110 million.
The assets are located in the Mideast, Far East, Asia Pacific and Gulf of Mexico and includes diving, diving support and other vessels and related gear in those areas.
The sale is subject to execution of a final agreement and satisfaction of other conditions, including regulatory waiting periods, it said.
Brent Ford, president of Sub Sea, said the transaction would free his company to focus on the market for offshore oil and gas production services, particularly in deepwater activities.
Dresser is a supplier of highly engineered products and services used in hydrocarbon energy-related activities.
